creditline: The Mr. and Mrs. Hall James Peterson Fund
description: abstracted portrait of girl, arm raised across body, 3/4 view
inscription:
Titled in pencil, LL: Mädchen Kopf

Inscribed in pencil, bottom edge, verso: K 36 \"Mädchen,\" 1921 (illegible) Mataré; inscribed in blue ink, LRC, verso: 62
provenance: (Galerie Gunther Franke, Munich); sold to MIA, 1969.
signed: Signed an dated in pencil, LR: Ew. Mataré 1921
title: Mädchen
